data.label: 腾讯云直播 SDK
data.description: 云直播（Cloud Streaming Services，CSS）依托腾讯强大的技术平台，将腾讯视频等核心业务底层能力开放给用户，为用户提供专业稳定快速的直播接入和分发服务，具有低延迟、高安全、高性能、易接入、多终端、多码率支持等特点。

data.label: 腾讯云直播 SDK
data.description: Cloud Streaming Services (CSS) relies on Tencent's powerful technical platform, opening up the core business underlying capabilities of Tencent Video to users, providing professional, stable, and fast live streaming access and distribution services, characterized by low latency, high security, high performance, easy access, multi-terminal, and multi-bitrate support.
